hypothesis_content.title: High-Beta Altcoin Momentum on BTC Breakout from Neutral
hypothesis_content.statement: When the market transitions from NEUTRAL to BULL regime AND BTC price breaks above its 20-day high on >20% above-average volume, the top 3 approved altcoins by 24-hour volume growth (>100% increase) will outperform BTC by >1.5x over the next 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Regime shifts to BULL with BTC breaking resistance trigger 'altcoin season' narratives. High volume growth altcoins capture speculative flows first as traders seek leveraged BTC exposure.
entry_conditions: Select top 3 approved altcoins by 24h volume growth (% change)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5 days after entry OR when altcoin/BTC ratio increases by 25%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Fewer than 2 of 3 selected altcoins outperform BTC by >1.5x over 5 days OR median altcoin return < BTC return.
